mapper.select: select t1.*, (select lang.field_value from sys_language lang where lang.table_name='sys_menu' and lang.field_name='name' and lang.table_id=t1.pid and lang.language=#{language}) as parentName, (select lang.field_value from sys_language lang where lang.table_name='sys_menu' and lang.field_name='name' and lang.table_id=t1.id and lang.language=#{language}) as name from sys_menu t1 where t1.id = #{id} and t1.del_flag = 0
select * from sys_menu where del_flag = 0 and pid = #{value}
